content.question: ​Which of the following functions has the end behaviors <math alttext="limit as x rightwards arrow negative infinity of p open parentheses x close parentheses equals infinity"><munder><mi>lim</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></munder><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>∞</mo></math> and <math alttext="limit as x rightwards arrow infinity of p open parentheses x close parentheses equals infinity"><munder><mi>lim</mi><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></munder><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>∞</mo></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="p open parentheses x close parentheses equals open parentheses x minus 10 close parentheses open parentheses x plus 2 close parentheses open parentheses x plus 3 close parentheses"><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

​<math alttext="p open parentheses x close parentheses equals open parentheses x minus 10 close parentheses open parentheses x plus 2 close parentheses open parentheses x plus 3 close parentheses open parentheses x plus 4 close parentheses"><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

​<math alttext="p open parentheses x close parentheses equals open parentheses 10 minus x close parentheses open parentheses x plus 2 close parentheses open parentheses x plus 3 close parentheses"><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>-</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

​<math alttext="p open parentheses x close parentheses equals open parentheses 10 minus x close parentheses open parentheses x plus 2 close parentheses open parentheses x plus 3 close parentheses open parentheses x plus 4 close parentheses"><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>-</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="p open parentheses x close parentheses equals open parentheses x minus 10 close parentheses open parentheses x plus 2 close parentheses open parentheses x plus 3 close parentheses open parentheses x plus 4 close parentheses"><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
